testcase.system-out:
Test Case: Buying in Amazon ============================================ 1.Navigate to the page https://www.amazon.in/. 2. Utilize the search box to look for "iPhone 13 (128GB) - Pink" by reading the value from an Excel sheet. 3. Assert that the displayed item title is "iPhone 13 (128GB) - Pink". 4. Select the item "iPhone 13 (128GB) - Pink" then scroll down to About this item section ,then verify if the partial text matches "15 cm (6.1-inch) Super Retina XDR display". 5. Add the item "iPhone 13 (128GB) - Pink" to the cart and validate whether the same item name and price are displayed. 6. Confirm that the subtotal is equal to the price of 52,999.00 by reading the value from an Excel sheet. 7. Delete the added item from the cart and verify whether the subtotal is now "0.00". 8. Capture screenshots throughout the process and generate a report according to your preferences. ============================================
Entered search text: iPhone 13 (128GB) - Pink Clicked on search button Apple iPhone 13 (128GB) - Pink is present Clicked on iPhone Pink Verified '15 cm (6.1-inch) Super Retina XDR display' is present Clicked on Add to Cart button Clicked on View Cart button Verified Subtotal Amount equals to 52,999.00 Clicked on Delete button Verified Subtotal Amount equals to 0.00
